name: Card Puzzle - Solitaire Fun
description:
Card Puzzle - Solitaire Fun Play is a classic game on PC. Game is also called Klondike Solitaire or Patience solitaire.Solitaire retain the classical play stytle, just single tap, drag or drag to move the card, bring you back to the times of Solitaire.

Features:
- Vegas mode:One round
- 4 card face styles
- 12 card back styles
- 10 table selection
- Unlimited undo and hints for free
- Auto complete to finish a solved game
- Hints to show next move
